text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I had a nice chat with Cafe-chan about various local topics. Folk tales, hot springs, cold noodles――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Oh, and also about wanko soba! Since we're here, I think we should try it as a commemoration♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I'm confident I can eat salad pretty quickly, but hmm, I wonder how many bowls of "wanko soba" I can handle?
